post.description:
Creates a session. 
A session refers to the continuous interaction between the user and Powerdrill within a conversation. Your team can have up to 150 sessions simultaneously. If the limit is reached, you can remove unnecessary sessions to make space for new ones.

parameters.name: x-pd-api-agent-id
parameters.description: The ID of the data agent. If not specified, the general mode will be used.

parameters.name: x-pd-external-trace-id
parameters.description: The external trace ID. The length ranges from 0 to 128 characters.

languageType.title: 输出语言类型
languageType.description: The language in which the output is generated.

maxMessagesInContext.description: The maximum number of messages retained per session.

code.title: 业务码
code.description:
Status code. **0** indicates that the operation is successful. Otherwise, the operation fails. Possible error codes include: 
- 100: Bad request. 
- 201: Request frequency limit.
- 9999: Internal error. 
- 100001: Invalid operation.
